an6.50:1.1: “Indriyasamvare, bhikkhave, asati indriyasamvaravipannassa hatupanisam hoti silam;
an6.50:1.2: sile asati silavipannassa hatupaniso hoti sammasamadhi;
an6.50:1.3: sammasamadhimhi asati sammasamadhivipannassa hatupanisam hoti yathabhutananadassanam;
an6.50:1.4: yathabhutananadassane asati yathabhutananadassanavipannassa hatupaniso hoti nibbidavirago;
an6.50:1.5: nibbidavirage asati nibbidaviragavipannassa hatupanisam hoti vimuttinanadassanam.
an6.50:1.7: Tassa papatikapi na paripurim gacchati, tacopi na paripurim gacchati, pheggupi na paripurim gacchati, saropi na paripurim gacchati.
an6.50:1.8: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, indriyasamvare asati indriyasamvaravipannassa hatupanisam hoti silam …pe…
an6.50:2.1: Indriyasamvare, bhikkhave, sati indriyasamvarasampannassa upanisasampannam hoti silam;
an6.50:2.2: sile sati silasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti sammasamadhi;
an6.50:2.3: sammasamadhimhi sati sammasamadhisampannassa upanisasampannam hoti yathabhutananadassanam;
an6.50:2.4: yathabhutananadassane sati yathabhutananadassanasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti nibbidavirago;
an6.50:2.5: nibbidavirage sati nibbidaviragasampannassa upanisasampannam hoti vimuttinanadassanam.
an6.50:2.6: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, rukkho sakhapalasasampanno. Tassa papatikapi paripurim gacchati, tacopi paripurim gacchati, pheggupi paripurim gacchati, saropi paripurim gacchati.
an6.50:2.7: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, indriyasamvare sati indriyasamvarasampannassa upanisasampannam hoti silam …pe…
